# Node modules, if you later use npm or yarn
node_modules/

# Dependency directories
bower_components/

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Logs
*.log

# Environment files
.env
.env.*

# VSCode settings
.vscode/

# Compiled source #
###################
*.com
*.class
*.dll
*.exe
*.o
*.so
*.pyc

# Build directories
dist/
build/

# Coverage directory used by tools like istanbul
coverage/

# Mac system files
Icon?
._*

# SASS cache
.sass-cache/

# npm package lock
package-lock.json
yarn.lock

# Optional: ignore cards directory if used for generated assets
# /cards/
